LanguageData.XmlExtensions_EnableStackTrace: Enable stack trace for XML patch errors
LanguageData.XmlExtensions_IncludeStandardModsTip: Include settings from mods that do not use XML Extensions (does not support settings created via HugsLib)
LanguageData.XmlExtensions_NoExtraSettings: No extra settings at the moment
LanguageData.XmlExtensions_ConfirmationResetMod: Are you sure you want to delete every unused key of the current mod?
LanguageData.XmlExtensions_ConfirmResetAll: Are you sure you want to delete all unused keys from every mod?
LanguageData.XmlExtensions_HowToPin: Right-click a mod to pin it
LanguageData.XmlExtensions_AddMainButton: Add a main button for opening the More Mod Settings menu
LanguageData.XmlExtensions_AddMainButtonTip: Adds a main button that opens the More Mod Settings menu when clicked
LanguageData.XmlExtensions_AdvancedDebugging: Enable advanced XML debugging mode? (Enable when troubleshooting)
LanguageData.XmlExtensions_AdvancedDebuggingTip: Enabling this option will list possible mods that are causing XML errors, but may impact your loading times. Recommended to only enable when trying to solve mod conflicts or troubleshooting.
LanguageData.XmlExtensions_EnableAdvancedDebuggingAnd: Boot game while Advanced Debugging is enabled to use Patch Analyzer.
